numerics_package.c

00001 #include "stdio.h"
00002 #include "math.h"
00003 #include "stdlib.h"
00004 #include "utility.h"
00005  
00006   
00010 #define MAXIT 100
00011 
00012 double my_rtsafe(funcd,x1,x2,xacc)
00013 
00014 double x1,x2,xacc;
00015 void   (*funcd)();
00016 
00017 {
00018   int           j;
00019   double                df,dx,dxold,f,fh,fl;
00020   double                swap,temp,xh,xl,rts;
00021   
00022   /* calculate the function value and the value of the first derivative 
00023      of the start values                                                 */
00024   (*funcd) (x1,&fl,&df);
00025   (*funcd) (x2,&fh,&df);
00026   if (fl*fh >= 0.0) {
00027     /* printf("Root must be bracketed in RTSAFE\n"); */
00028     return 999.;
00029   }
00030   
00031   
00032   if (fl < 0.0) {
00033     xl = x1;
00034     xh = x2;
00035   } else {
00036     xh = x1;
00037     xl = x2;
00038     swap = fl;
00039     fl = fh;
00040     fh = swap;
00041   }
00042   rts = 0.5 * (x1 + x2);
00043   dxold = fabs(x2-x1);
00044   dx = dxold;
00045   
00046   (*funcd) (rts,&f,&df);
00047   
00048   for (j=1; j<=MAXIT; ++j) {
00049     if ((((rts-xh)*df-f) * ((rts-xl)*df-f) >= 0.0) ||
00050         (fabs(2.0 * f) > fabs(dxold*df))) {
00051       dxold = dx;
00052       dx = 0.5 * (xh-xl);
00053       rts = xl + dx;
00054       if (xl == rts) return rts;
00055     } else {
00056       dxold = dx;
00057       dx = f/df;
00058       temp = rts;
00059       rts -= dx;
00060       if (temp == rts) return rts;
00061     }
00062     if (fabs(dx) < xacc) return rts;
00063     
00064     (*funcd) (rts,&f,&df);
00065     
00066     if (f < 0.0) {
00067       xl = rts;
00068       fl = f;
00069     } else {
00070       xh = rts;
00071       fh = f;
00072     }
00073   }
00074   
00075   printf("Maximum number of iterations exeeded in RTSAFE\n");
00076   return 999;
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 /*******************************************************************************
00081   Runge-Kutta method of 4th order
00082   *******************************************************************************/
00083 void my_rk4(y,dydx,n,x,h,yout,derivs)
00084      
00085      double y[],dydx[],x,h,yout[];
00086      void   (*derivs)();
00087      int n;
00088      
00089 {
00090   int   i;
00091   double        xh,hh,h6,*dym,*dyt,*yt,*my_vector();
00092   void          my_free_vector();
00093   
00094   
00095   dym = my_vector(1,n);
00096   dyt = my_vector(1,n);
00097   yt  = my_vector(1,n);
00098   hh = h * 0.5;
00099   h6 = h/6;
00100   xh = x + hh;
00101   for (i=1;i<=n;++i) yt[i] = y[i] + hh * dydx[i];
00102   (*derivs)(xh,yt,dyt);
00103   for (i=1;i<=n;++i) yt[i] = y[i] + hh * dyt[i];
00104   (*derivs)(xh,yt,dym);
00105   for (i=1;i<=n;++i) {
00106     yt[i]       = y[i] + h * dym[i];
00107     dym[i] += dyt[i];
00108   }
00109   (*derivs)(x+h,yt,dyt);
00110   for (i=1;i<=n;++i) 
00111     yout[i] = y[i]+h6*(dydx[i] + dyt[i] + 2.0 * dym[i]);
00112   
00113   my_free_vector(yt,1,n);
00114   my_free_vector(dyt,1,n);
00115   my_free_vector(dym,1,n);
00116 }
